name: Waiter
description:
Waiter is a first person game about a waiter. In this cool game, you play as a waiter who needs to serve drinks to club customers. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with fun and perky music!

Would you like to feel like a waiter? If your answer is yes, then don't skip this game. Plunge into the world of fun! Get real pleasures, delivering drinks to your favorite customers. Remember that your time is limited! At the end of time, you will lose! Enjoy the passage of this game with fun music that will definitely not let you get bored!

Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly cool levels!
Very beautiful graphics!
Wonderful music!
